Title: Relates to solar arrays on certain municipal buildings
Summary: Requires solar arrays on certain eligible municipal buildings; defines "eligible municipal building" to be a building which, with no major modification, could successfully house solar arrays; exempts such expenditures from provisions of the tax cap.
LawCode: Add Art 5-M ยง119-mm, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to solar arrays on certain municipal buildings
